Wow! Look Leah, those kids built a tree house!
I wish we could have a house like that!
A tree house, that's really hard,
but we can build a house on the ground!
That could really be a lot of fun!
Ok, come, let's look for a place to build our house!
Maybe we'll build our house here?
This looks like a real good place!
You want them pecking at you?
So let's go look for another place!
